name: Death is on Sale
description:
Ever wanted to manage your own hell? 

Death is on Sale is an action puzzle where you put your dead customers to the last journey -  straight to the boilers! But beware of the hell bosses -- each boss has their own taste of death 😈

Instructions: 
  • Put boilers to the grid
  • Drag and drop customers to the boilers 
  • Fill the boilers with customers, until the boiler is full

More details in how_to_play.pdf

Credits:
  • Alexander Soor - design, code
  • Darina Nguyen Locovna - art, design
  • Andrew Zakolodnyi- design
  • Alena Zakolodna - design
  • Vasiliy Rollin - design
  • Anton Witkowski - music

The game was part of the local Game Jam 2019 in Kharkiv, Ukraine.
